title: Animal Science Capstone Design Thinking-Based Collaborative Project Learning Program

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational theories in animal science and experimental methodologies
context.additional_context: Collaborative Project-Based Learning Applying a 10-Step Design Thinking Process in Blended (Online/Offline) Environments Utilizing Digital Devices

learning_goals: Learners can solve real-world problems in animal science following a 10-step design thinking process
Learners enhance problem-solving and communication competencies through team-based collaborative activities.
Learners can propose improvements to project designs linked to learning theories.

resources: Digital collaboration tools (online whiteboards, project management software, etc.)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
